channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: California to Paramount: Assimilate This
item.description: After Netflix dropped out of the race to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, Paramount is poised for victory—but it's not there yet.

item.title: The Trump phone sure looks a lot like this HTC handset
item.description: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump phone's whereabouts, and have stopped getting a response. This week, thanks to a reader tip, we think we've found the original phone the T1 is based on. A long time ago, back […]

item.title: Anthropic vs. the Pentagon: What’s actually at stake?
item.description: Anthropic and the Pentagon are clashing over AI use in autonomous weapons and surveillance, raising high-stakes questions about national security, corporate control, and who sets the rules for military AI.

item.title: OpenAI Fires an Employee for Prediction Market Insider Trading
item.description: Prediction markets like Polymarket and Kalshi are big business, and some Big Tech employees are testing boundaries by making trades based on insider knowledge.

item.title: CISA is getting a new acting director after less than a year
item.description: The US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), which is part of the Department of Homeland Security, is getting a new acting director, as reported by ABC, less than a year after Madhu Gottumukkala took charge of the agency as deputy director and acting director in May 2025. CISA's executive assistant director for cybersecurity, Nick […]...

item.title: Everything Larry and David Ellison Will Control If Paramount Buys Warner Bros.
item.description: Paramount Skydance’s sprawling media empire will get a major boost if the deal is approved.

item.title: AI deepfakes are a train wreck and Samsung’s selling tickets
item.description: On Thursday morning, I attended a Q&A panel with four top Samsung smartphone executives. Until 2025, Samsung was the world's largest smartphone manufacturer, and by association, the world's largest maker of cameras. It's still the second largest after Apple. Samsung handed me the microphone first. I asked: We see a divide in society between people […]...

item.title: 11 things to expect at MWC 2026 — from the Nothing Phone 4a to Honor's humanoid robot
item.description: MWC 2026 is kicking off soon, and we have a good idea of what to expect at this tech-packed event.

item.title: FedEx will refund customers for Trump’s tariffs — if there ever are any refunds
item.description: FedEx plans to pass along any refunds resulting from the Supreme Court's ruling that some of President Donald Trump's tariffs are "illegal." In a statement on its website, FedEx notes that while "no refund process has been established by the courts," the company will reimburse shippers and consumers impacted by tariffs if it gets its […]

item.title: Pour moins de 140 euros, cet écran Lenovo optimisé pour le gaming (144 Hz, 1 ms) est une super affaire
item.description: Avec cette remise qui le fait tomber à 139,90 euros, cet écran gaming de Lenovo est très intéressant. Il pourra vous offrir de superbes performances à l'image de son taux de rafraîchissement de 144 Hz pour des sessions de jeu très plaisantes.

item.title: Amazon’s Fire TV Stick 4K Plus gets a better interface and a 40 percent discount
item.description: When Amazon first showed off its redesigned Fire TV OS at CES, we were impressed. It’s faster, better organized, and feels similar to Google’s top-notch TV interface. The update is now finally rolling out to the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Plus, making it an even better buy now that it’s on sale for $29.99 […]

item.title: Lego’s March Releases Need a Hero (of Time)
item.description: Plus, the 'Star Wars' smart brick sets are here... whether you want them to be or not.

item.title: As a lifelong Pokémon fan, the return of FireRed and LeafGreen has me feeling hopeful — now I need these 3 classic entries to land on Nintendo Switch and Switch 2
item.description: It's great to see some classic Pokémon land on Switch and Switch 2, but if these titles land on modern platforms, I'll be absolutely over the moon.

item.title: ChatGPT reaches 900M weekly active users
item.description: OpenAI shared the new numbers as part of its announcement that it has raised $110 billion in private funding.

item.title: Pokémon Presents: Every Pokémon Day announcement today
item.description: Here's everything you need to know from the 30th anniversary of Pokémon event.

item.title: NASA Announces Major Revamp of Its Artemis Moon Program
item.description: The agency tacked on an additional flight in 2027 to test lunar landers in Earth orbit.

item.title: « Dès que nous serons convaincus » : les batteries silicium carbone peinent à séduire Samsung
item.description: Samsung confirme encore une fois travailler sur les batteries silicium-carbone sans pour autant en être satisfait pour le moment.

item.title: Insider Trading Allegations Are Yet Another Example of Crypto Being No Different From Wall Street
item.description: Crypto is crashing but the outlook for insider trading scams is bullish.

item.title: ‘We don’t know if the models are conscious‘ — Anthropic’s CEO isn’t sure if Claude AI is conscious but he'd probably quite like it if you upgraded to Claude Max just to find out
item.description: Anthropic’s CEO raises the question about Claude, and the timing is interesting.

item.title: Watch out - that Google Tasks email could be a scam, and land you in hot water at work
item.description: Hackers found a new legitimate tool to abuse, and this time it's Google Tasks.

item.title: Ford issues safety warning for over 4.3 million vehicles — as a software glitch sparks one of the biggest recalls for years
item.description: Ford issues a massive recall that could affect 4.4 million cars, as software gremlin makes towing unsafe.

item.title: Happy Pokémon Day. Heres where to buy the 30th-anniversary card collection for the best price.
item.description: As of Feb. 27, you can get the Pokémon TCG: Pokémon Day 2026 Collection for $38.95 at Amazon.

item.title: Camping season is around the corner — grab this Anker Solix C800x power station for over 40% off
item.description: The Anker Solix C800x portable power station is down to just $379.99 at Amazon, a savings of over 40%.
